long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the simple and quick version of the renowned â€œAwesome Screenshotâ€ extension.

Want to share your screen for cases like reporting technical issues, making product demos or how-to tutorials ã€quicklyã€‘?  Here are 7ï¸âƒ£ reasons to choose Awesome Screenshot tool 

1ï¸âƒ£ Provide stable service for more than 10 years
2ï¸âƒ£Loved by more than 3 millions users across different platforms ğŸ‘
3ï¸âƒ£ Easy to use with shortcuts 
4ï¸âƒ£ No ads and respect your privacy
5ï¸âƒ£Powerful features special designed for taking a screenshot quickly 
6ï¸âƒ£Quick Customer support
7ï¸âƒ£ Most importantly,  your voice matters! ğŸ—£ & Continuous improvements

Here are some features for this simple "Awesome screenshot"


ğŸ“¸ğŸ“¸ğŸ“¸ Capture Screenshot ğŸ“¸ğŸ“¸ğŸ“¸


ğŸ“· Screen Capture
    â–¸ Capture a screenshot of the page you visit, full page, selected area or visible part
    â–¸ Capture a screenshot of your entire screen or a specific application window (coming soon)
    â–¸ Capture visible part, entire screen or app window after delay (Coming soon)


ğŸ– Annotate Screenshot
    â–¸ Resize or crop a screenshot to the size you need
    â–¸ Annotate your screenshot with rectangles, circles, arrows, lines, etc.
    â–¸ Add text to your screenshot with or without background color, change text font and font size
    â–¸ Blur sensitive information on your screenshot
    â–¸ Highlight important part on your screenshot
    â–¸ Select a local image or paste a copied image from your clipboard to annotate


ğŸ“¥ Copy & Save Screenshot
    â–¸ Save screenshot as image in PNG or download screenshot as PDF
    â–¸ Copy a screenshot directly when capturing selected area for quick pasting



ğŸ“§ Contact usğŸ“§

Shoot a message to care@awesomescreenshot.com  if you experience any problem. Let us know your thoughts! Thank you.
long.zh_CN:
Awesome Screenshot App is an annotation tool for your screenshot and picture.

The app works for Chrome 36 and later versions.  Please update your chrome if it doesn't work for you.

 ã€Capture ã€‘
 1. Capture windows 
 2. Drag and drop a picture in the app to annotate


 ã€Annotate & Editã€‘
 1. Annotate it with rectangles, circles, arrows, lines and text
 2. Use eraser to hide sensitive information 
 

 ã€Save & Shareã€‘
1. Save to local disk
2. One-click to upload to awesomescreenshot.com and get a shareable link 
3. Support Google Drive



 ã€Optional search enhancement featureã€‘
  Since many users don't like it, we remove this feature.
